solution_line_template: At the back of stores, the town has paid for {street_trash_cans} trash cans on the streets * {multiplier_twice} = <<{street_trash_cans}*{multiplier_twice}={store_trash_cans}>>{store_trash_cans} trash cans.

The town has therefore added {street_trash_cans} trash cans on the streets + {store_trash_cans} trash cans at the back of stores = <<{street_trash_cans}+{store_trash_cans}={total_trash_cans}>>{total_trash_cans} trash cans.
